Title: Hero
Writer: Laura Ziskin (story), Alvin Sargent (story), David Webb Peoples (story), David Webb Peoples (screenplay)
Actors: Dustin Hoffman, Geena Davis, Andy Garcia, Joan Cusack
Plot: Bernie LaPlante is having a rough time. He's divorced, his ex-wife hates him, and has custody of their son. The cops are setting a trap for him, then to top it all, he loses a shoe while rescuing passengers of a plane crash. Being a thief who is down on his luck, he takes advantage of the rescue, but then someone else claims credit for it.
